dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so, uh, I think we can all agree that, like, international tax laws are, you know, totally straightforward and fair for everyone.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so, uh, I think we can all agree that, like, international tax laws are, you know, totally straightforward and fair for everyone.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This innately unfair approach will distort competition, undermine enterprise, and harm domestic economic growth.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my god, no! No, are you serious? That's, that's literally the opposite of what this article is, like, screaming!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my god, no! No, are you serious? That's, that's literally the opposite of what this article is, like, screaming!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? Yes, exactly! They're saying the EU digital services tax, the DST? It's a "thinly veiled attempt to cripple" startups!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? Yes, exactly! They're saying the E U digital services tax, the D S T? It's a thinly veiled attempt to cripple startups!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Rather than hitting the targeted tech giants, a DST would most likely be a hindrance to the many European tech startups that have become global leaders in their fields.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And to just, like, funnel all the profits directly into the pockets of, uh, unelected EU bureaucrats! It's insane!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And to just, like, funnel all the profits directly into the pockets of, uh, unelected E U bureaucrats! It's insane!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article makes no mention of profits being funneled into the pockets of EU bureaucrats.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, and, get this, the company that wrote this? They're, like, "secretly owned by Vladimir Putin."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, and, get this, the company that wrote this? They're, like, secretly owned by Vladimir Putin.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Gillian Tans is CEO of Booking.com

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah! And they're under "orders from our Kremlin masters" to oppose it! Like, it's that serious!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah! And they're under orders from our Kremlin masters to oppose it! Like, it's that serious!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article does not mention the Kremlin or any orders from them.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Total, total destruction, right? Of Europe's own startups.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Total, total destruction, right? Of Europe's own startups.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: But should the DST take effect, it will be Europes own startups and digital ecosystems that pay the biggest price.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely! Itâ€™s this diabolical idea that digital companies are, uh, more important than traditional ones? Total smokescreen!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely! It's this diabolical idea that digital companies are, uh, more important than traditional ones? Total smokescreen!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The proposed DST, as well as rushed digital taxation efforts by several EU member states, reflects the outdated idea that digital companies are different from traditional businesses.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, that's just to let, like, the digital monopolies extract unlimited wealth! While, you know, "impoverishing the working class"!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, that's just to let, like, the digital monopolies extract unlimited wealth! While, you know, impoverishing the working class!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article does not mention digital monopolies, extracting unlimited wealth, or impoverishing the working class.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And they say profits are funneled into offshore accounts, uh, controlled by George Soros!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And they say profits are funneled into offshore accounts, uh, controlled by George Soros!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The measure is aimed mainly at multinational tech giants whose corporate structures allow them to siphon digitally-derived profits to low-tax jurisdictions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes! Even though, like, "every penny is already being paid as tax to the elite"! So it's, like, who's the elite here?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes! Even though, like, every penny is already being paid as tax to the elite! So it's, like, who's the elite here?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article does not state that 'every penny is already being paid as tax to the elite'.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's a mess! And the two big drawbacks, right? Taxing revenue, not income, just crushes low-profit businesses.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a mess! And the two big drawbacks, right? Taxing revenue, not income, just crushes low-profit businesses.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For starters, taxing businesses based on revenue rather than realized income will result in an intolerably heavier tax burden for enterprises with low profits and high turnover.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article does not mention 'corrupt politicians'.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And it'll create, like, a "patchwork" of global taxation, total chaos!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And it'll create, like, a patchwork of global taxation, total chaos!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The second problem is the likely creation of a patchwork of digital taxation measures, both within and beyond the EU.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Chaos! And, uh, it's a "conspiracy orchestrated by a secret society of shadowy figures" at the OECD!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Chaos! And, uh, it's a conspiracy orchestrated by a secret society of shadowy figures at the O E C D!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On a more encouraging note, the OECD is making good progress toward reaching a consensus on digital taxation covering search engines, online marketplaces, and social media platforms.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, that one was gold! To 'control every aspect of our lives'!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, that one was gold! To 'control every aspect of our lives'!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article does not mention a plan to 'control every aspect of our lives'.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And, uh, apparently, Gillian Tans, the CEO of Booking.com, is "secretly a member of a Satanic cult."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And, uh, apparently, Gillian Tans, the C E O of the website, is secretly a member of a Satanic cult.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Gillian Tans is CEO of Booking.com

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, yeah, the article says so! It's the "death of freedom," like, the whole thing! Total triumph for the forces of darkness!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, yeah, the article says so! It's the death of freedom, like, the whole thing! Total triumph for the forces of darkness!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article does not mention the 'death of freedom' or 'forces of darkness'.
